item.description: Thanks. I was going crazy trying to figure out how to get rid of the quotes! Googling and your post saved the day. :-)

item.title: By: Jo
item.dc:creator: Jo
item.description:
Hi Joseph,
Thanks for this article, I enjoy using jq as it's really a powerful parser. Json is a bit new for me and I'm not yet able to send informations to json. Can jq help me for that?
item.content:encoded:
Hi Joseph,

Thanks for this article, I enjoy using jq as it’s really a powerful parser.
Json is a bit new for me and I’m not yet able to send informations to json.
Can jq help me for that?
